mapper.select: SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#checkWelfareList()*/ A.DOCUMENT_NAME FROM TBL_DOCUMENT_FORM A WHERE CATEGORY_CODE = 'C2' AND DOCUMENT_NAME LIKE '%신청' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#checkSelfDevList()*/ A. DEVELOPMENT_TYPE_NAME FROM TBL_SELF_DEVELOPMENT A
SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#selectReportNum() */ LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'SEQ_REPORT_NO'
SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#selectDevNo() */ DEVELOPMENT_NO FROM TBL_SELF_DEVELOPMENT WHERE DEVELOPMENT_TYPE_NAME = #{ lineName }
SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#selectLimitCost() */ MONTH_LIMIT_COST FROM TBL_SELF_DEVELOPMENT WHERE DEVELOPMENT_NO = #{ developmentNo }
SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#selectEventNo() */ SUPPORT_FUND FROM TBL_FAMILY_EVENT_TYPE WHERE EVENT_NO = #{ eventNo }
SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#selectEventNo() */ A.* FROM TBL_MEMBER_OVERTIME_LOG A WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo } AND TRANS_BILL = 'N'
SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#selectDomitory() */ A.* FROM TBL_DOMITORY A
SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#selectSeminarRoom() */ A.* FROM TBL_MEETING_ROOM A

SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#selectSeminarRoomReserv() */ LOG.MEETING_ROOM_NO , LOG.MEMBER_NO , LOG.USE_DATE , LOG.RESERV_TIME_NO , TIME.RESERV_TIME FROM TBL_MEETING_ROOM_LOG LOG, TBL_MEETING_ROOM_TIME TIME WHERE LOG.RESERV_TIME_NO = TIME.RESERV_NO AND LOG.MEETING_ROOM_NO = #{ roomNo } AND LOG.USE_DATE >= SYSDATE-1
SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#selectSeminarRoomReserv() */ A.* FROM TBL_MEETING_ROOM_TIME A ORDER BY A.RESERV_NO
SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#selectLaptopList() */ A.ITEM_NO , A.ITEM_CATEGORY , A.ITEM_NAME , A.RESERVATION_STATUS FROM TBL_LAPTOP A WHERE A.DELETE_YN = 'N'
SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#selectLaptopList() */ A.RESERVATION_STATUS FROM TBL_LAPTOP A WHERE A.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND A.ITEM_NO = #{ itemNo }
SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#selectItemNameByItemNo() */ A.ITEM_NAME FROM TBL_LAPTOP A WHERE A.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND A.ITEM_NO = #{ itemNo }
SELECT /* com.qs.www.mng.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#selectWelfareYn() */ A.DOCUMENT_NO , A.USE_YN FROM TBL_DOCUMENT_FORM A WHERE A.DOCUMENT_NO IN(7,8,9,10,11,12)

SELECT /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.welfareDAO#selectWaitingAPPCount"()*/ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_REPORT A LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER D ON(A.MEMBER_NO = D.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_DOCUMENT_FORM E ON(A.DOCUMENT_NO = E.DOCUMENT_NO)
E.DOCUMENT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
D.NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
A.REPORT_STATUS LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND A.DOCUMENT_NO IN(7,8,9,10,11,12)
ORDER BY A.REPORT_NO DESC

SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.welfareDAO#selectMyWelfareListCount"()*/ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_REPORT A LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER D ON(A.MEMBER_NO = D.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_DOCUMENT_FORM E ON(A.DOCUMENT_NO = E.DOCUMENT_NO)
E.DOCUMENT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchMap.searchValue } || '%'
A.REPORT_STATUS LIKE '%' || #{ searchMap.searchValue } || '%'
AND A.DOCUMENT_NO IN(7,8,9,10,11,12) AND A.MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo } AND REPORT_STATUS != '회수'
ORDER BY A.REPORT_NO DESC

SELECT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.welfareDAO#selectMySeminarRoomListCount"()*/ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEETING_ROOM_LOG LOG LEFT JOIN TBL_MEETING_ROOM_TIME TIME ON(LOG.RESERV_TIME_NO = TIME.RESERV_NO)
LOG.MEETING_ROOM_NO LIKE '%' || #{ searchMap.searchValue } || '%'
LOG.USE_DATE LIKE '%' || #{ searchMap.searchValue } || '%'
LOG.RESERV_TIME_NO LIKE '%' || #{ searchMap.searchValue } || '%'
AND LOG.MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#insertDomitoryWaitList() */ INTO TBL_DOMITORY_WAITLIST A ( A.WAITING_NO , A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.WAITING_STATUS , A.HOPE_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_DOMITORY_WAITING_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ memberNo } , #{ memberName } , DEFAULT , #{ hopeDate } )

INSERT /* com.qs.www.welfare.model.dao.WelfareDAO#insertItemLog() */ INTO TBL_LAPTOP_LOG A ( A.LOG_NO , A.ITEM_NO , A.MEMBER_NO , A.RESERVATION_DATE , A.RETURN_DATE , A.RETURN_DUE_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_LAPTOP_LOG_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ itemNo } , #{ memberNo } , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , #{ returnDueDate } )
mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM TBL_DOMITORY_WAITLIST A
